address_id.description: Unique identifier for the address associated with the order.

address_is_active.description: Indicator of whether the address is currently active or not.

address1.description: First line of the billing address.

address2.description: Second line of the billing address.

cart_note.description: Any additional notes related to the billing address.

discount_id.description: Identifier of the discount applied to the billing address.

last_name.description: Last name associated with the billing address.

phone.description: Phone number associated with the billing address.

zip.description: Zip or postal code of the billing address.

browser_ip.description: IP address of the browser used during the order.

payment_processor.description: Name of the payment processor used for the external transaction.

payment_processor_name.description: Name of the payment processor used for the charge.

browser_ip.description: IP address of the client's browser.

user_agent.description: Information about the user agent (browser) used by the client.

items.description: Items related to the discounts applied to the order.

error.description: Error details related to the order.

Number of the order in the external ecommerce system.
